Song.title: You Have Saved Us
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Paul Baloche & Ben Gowell. Â© 2009 Integrity Worship Music | Leadworship Songs (Admin. by Integrity Music, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C G | D Em7 | C G | D Em7 | ]
Verse 1: [C] Who am I that [D]You would know me [C] Who are we to [Dsus]You Lord [D] [C] You have shown Your [D]love and mercy [C] We are strangers [Dsus]no more [D] We are [Am7]daughters we [Em7]are sons All beca[G]use of what You've [Dsus]done
Chorus: You have sa[C]ved us [G D] You [Em7]have ra[C]ised us [G]up with Y[D]ou You have sa[C]ved us [G D] Called [Em7]us o[C]ut and [G]made us [Dsus]new [D]
[| C G | D Em7 | C G | D Em7 | ]
Verse 2: [C] Turn our hearts from ea[D]rthly idols [C] Turn our eyes to [Dsus]You Lord [D] [C] Only You can h[D]eal what's broken [C] Only You can [Dsus]restore [D] We are [Am7]daughters we [Em7]are sons All beca[G]use of what You've [Dsus]done
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 who am i that you would know me who are we to you lord you have shown your love and mercy we are strangers no more we are daughters we are sons all because of what youve done chorus you have saved us you have raised us up with you you have saved us called us out and made us new verse 2 turn our hearts from earthly idols turn our eyes to you lord only you can heal whats broken only you can restore we are daughters we are sons all because of what youve done

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C G | D Em7 | C G | D Em7 | ]
Verse 1: [C] Who am I that [D]You would know me [C] Who are we to [Dsus]You Lord [D] [C] You have shown Your [D]love and mercy [C] We are strangers [Dsus]no more [D] We are [Am7]daughters we [Em7]are sons All beca[G]use of what You've [Dsus]done
Chorus: You have sa[C]ved us [G D] You [Em7]have ra[C]ised us [G]up with Y[D]ou You have sa[C]ved us [G D] Called [Em7]us o[C]ut and [G]made us [Dsus]new [D]
[| C G | D Em7 | C G | D Em7 | ]
Verse 2: [C] Turn our hearts from ea[D]rthly idols [C] Turn our eyes to [Dsus]You Lord [D] [C] Only You can h[D]eal what's broken [C] Only You can [Dsus]restore [D] We are [Am7]daughters we [Em7]are sons All beca[G]use of what You've [Dsus]done
{new_page} Chorus: You have sa[C]ved us [G D] You [Em7]have ra[C]ised us [G]up with Y[D]ou You have sa[C]ved us [G D] Called [Em7]us o[C]ut and [G]made us [Dsus]new [D]
Joyful: [G]Joyful, joyful [C]we adore Thee, [G]God of glory, [Dsus]Lord of [D]love, [G]Hearts unfold like [C]flowers before Thee, [G]opening to the [D]sun a[G]bove. [D]Melt the [G]clouds of [D]sin and [G]sadness, [D]drive the [B]dark of [Em]doubt [A]a[D]way; [G]Giver of im[C]mortal gladness, [G]fill us with the [D]light of [G]day. [D]Melt the [G]clouds of [D]sin and [G]sadness, [D]drive the [B]dark of [Em]doubt [A]a[D]way; [G]Giver of im[C]mortal gladness, [G]fill us with the [D]light of [| C G | D Em7 | (Rep. 3X) ]day.
Chorus: You have sa[C]ved us [G D] You [Em7]have ra[C]ised us [G]up with Y[D]ou You have sa[C]ved us [G D] Called [Em7]us o[C]ut and [G]made us [Dsus]new [D]
[| C G | D Em7 | C G | D Em7 | ]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 who am i that you would know me who are we to you lord you have shown your love and mercy we are strangers no more we are daughters we are sons all because of what youve done chorus you have saved us you have raised us up with you you have saved us called us out and made us new verse 2 turn our hearts from earthly idols turn our eyes to you lord only you can heal whats broken only you can restore we are daughters we are sons all because of what youve done chorus you have saved us you have raised us up with you you have saved us called us out and made us new joyful joyful joyful we adore thee god of glory lord of love hearts unfold like flowers before thee opening to the sun above melt the clouds of sin and sadness drive the dark of doubt away giver of immortal gladness fill us with the light of day melt the clouds of sin and sadness drive the dark of doubt away giver of immortal gladness fill us with the light of day chorus you have saved us you have raised us up with you you have saved us called us out and made us new
